title: Ep. 61: Injured QBs And The Playoff Picture
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Danny Kelly discuss Derek Carr’s broken leg and its impact on Oakland (1:32), Marcus Mariota’s injury (10:06), Cleveland's win (19:41), the Chiefs’ sleeper offense (21:54), and their "Starting Five Ringer NFL Show All-Stars" (31:53).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
